channel.title: web scraping on Joshua M. Rosenberg

item.title: In what months are educational psychology jobs posted?
item.description: Division 15 of the American Psychological Association sponsors the Ed Psych Jobs website, which is an excellent resource for Ed Psych job seekers. I thought it would possibly be helpful to see when jobs were posted in the past in order to have a better idea about when jobs may be posted this year. Ed Psych Jobs, Robots (.txt), and paths_allowed, oh my As this project involves a bit of web-scraping, I first checked the robots.
